creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: metal case in two pieces which no longer separates--appears fused closed; knotted green cord through center; design of circles and lines engraved on both sides; rattles when shaken--needles inside?
title: Needle Case
